name: Amanda Xiong
label: DevOps Engineer
summary: I’m a DevOps and Software Engineer with years of experience streamlining deployments and building secure, reliable systems in finance and digital payments.

highlights: Standardized AWS infrastructure with Terraform and Terragrunt across accounts and regions.
Automated AWS security checks with Python, cutting audits by 70% and ensuring compliance.
Migrated GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines to multi-env—boosting weekly deploymentsby 40%.
Redesigned DynamoDB backup validation with Step Functions and Lambdas, ensuring reliable monthly checks.
Provided technical support, investigated incidents, and troubleshot for developers on AWS.
Revamped Jenkins with SonarQube, OWASP, and Trivy, refactoring via ArgoCD, EKS, and Kubernetes.
Deployed microservices on Kubernetes with Docker and MongoDB, ensuring reliable performance.
Monitored containers with Prometheus and Grafana, adding alerts and dashboards for real-time insights.
Resolved production issues in Linux-based systems, ensuring timely recovery.
Configured CI/CD pipelines with quality gates to maintain 24/7 business continuity.
Implemented testing, health checks, DB upgrades, and disaster recovery with Oracle Data Guard.
Automated post-deployment health checks with Bash, improving system reliability.
Developed a Java Spring Boot data gateway to decode ISO8583 packets from IBM mainframe and forward them via TCP/IP, Kafka, and RocketMQ.
Optimized slow SQL problem based on monitoring feedback from the production Oracle database.
Managed monthly release pipelines with user whitelisting for canary production releases.
Managed DEV, SIT, UAT, and Production environments.

projects.title: Educational Content Creator on YouTube
projects.summary: Channel focused on creating tutorials and walkthroughs for software developers, programmers, and engineers.

volunteer_experience.summary: Completed a three-week ocean safety program at Bondi Beach, Sydney, gaining practical and theoretical skills in beach and surf safety.
highlights: Learned floating techniques in rips and waves
Trained in basic CPR and first aid

education.institution: The University of New South Wales
